definition: to move (i.e. relocate oneself)/to move (sth relatively heavy or bulky)/to shift/to copy indiscriminately
(of sth) to move/to set in movement/to displace/to touch/to make use of/to stir (emotions)/to alter/abbr. for 動詞|动词[dong4 ci2], verb

sentences.english: We can't move that hulking great desk on our own.
sentences.chinese: 靠我们自己没法搬动那张又大又笨重的办公桌。

sentences.english: Wang Chao is strong enough to carry the box.
sentences.chinese: 王超足够强壮，他能搬动那个箱子。

sentences.english: The tall man is strong enough to carry the heavy box.
sentences.chinese: 这个高个子男人够强壮的了，能够搬动那个重箱子。

sentences.english: The man is strong enough to carry the stone.
sentences.chinese: 那个男子很壮，足以搬动那快石头。

sentences.english: The problem with this was that in the past the recievers were much too heavy for climbers to carry.
sentences.chinese: 问题是过去，接收器都太重了以至于爬山者无法搬动。

sentences.english: Hist was stirring the furniture at the kitchen.
sentences.chinese: 希斯特正在厨房里搬动家具。

sentences.english: Jones says we must not think of moving her.
sentences.chinese: 钟斯大夫也说，千万不可以叫她搬动。

sentences.english: Moving chairs on the floor will be issued from time to time the sound is ear-piercing .
sentences.chinese: 在地板上搬动椅子时常会发出令人刺耳的响声。

sentences.english: He is trying to move the book shelf.
sentences.chinese: 他正试图搬动那个书架。

sentences.english: He manful efforts to move the heavy furniture .
sentences.chinese: 他勇敢的搬动沉重的家具。

sentences.english: It wso a precious moment I didn't wish to move.
sentences.chinese: 那一刻云云宝贵乃至于我没有念搬动半步。

sentences.english: Do not move the desks of chairs about. Close the windows when leaving.
sentences.chinese: 不得随便搬动桌椅，离开时关好窗户。

sentences.english: Volume hose should be moving into a discoid not significant.
sentences.chinese: 软管应卷成盘状搬动，切勿着地。

sentences.english: Cover furniture that cpernot quite possibly be moved.
sentences.chinese: 将不能搬动的家具遮掩遮挡掩瞒起来。

sentences.english: Can you carry the heavy box?
Relocating those facilities might prove a logistical challenge, while storing reloads farther from their launch points would be rather meaningless.
sentences.chinese: 搬动这些设施可能是一个后勤挑战。

definition: to pull out/to pull a lever
to fiddle with/to tamper with/to meddle with/to move randomly/to flail about
to move (i.e. relocate oneself)/to move (sth relatively heavy or bulky)/to shift/to copy indiscriminately
to operate by means of a pedal
to drag/to tow/(computing) to drag (mouse operation)
